members.name: netlifyEdgeAdapter
members.content:
```typescript
export declare function netlifyEdgeAdapter(opts?: NetlifyEdgeAdapterOptions): any;
```


|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opts | [NetlifyEdgeAdapterOptions](#netlifyedgeadapteroptions) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

any

members.name: NetlifyEdgeAdapterOptions
members.content:
```typescript export interface NetlifyEdgeAdapterOptions extends ServerAdapterOptions ``` **Extends:** ServerAdapterOptions | Property | Modifiers | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | [excludedPath?](#) | | string | _(Optional)_ Manually add path pattern that should be excluded from the edge function routes that are created by the 'manifest.json' file. | | [functionRoutes?](#) | | boolean |

_(Optional)_ Determines if the build should generate the edge functions declarations manifest.json file.

https://docs.netlify.com/edge-functions/declarations/

Defaults to true.

| | [staticPaths?](#) | | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ Manually add pathnames that should be treated as static paths and not SSR. For example, when these pathnames are requested, their response should come from a static file, rather than a server-side rendered response. |
